thread.title: Vucevic scores 18, Magic top Brazilian team Flamengo 90-73
thread.title_full: Vucevic scores 18, Magic top Brazilian team Flamengo 90-73

title: Vucevic scores 18, Magic top Brazilian team Flamengo 90-73
text:
Felipe Dana Vucevic scores 18, Magic top Brazilian team Flamengo 90-73 
Orlando Magic's Tobias Harris goes to the basket past the defense of Brazil Flamengo's Rafael Luz, during a preseason basketball game as part of the NBA Global Games Rio 2015 at the HSBC Arena in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015. (AP Photo/Felipe Dana) Felipe Dana Vucevic scores 18, Magic top Brazilian team Flamengo 90-73 
Orlando Magic's Shabazz Napier, right, drives past Brazil Flamengo's Gege, during a preseason basketball game as part of the NBA Global Games Rio 2015 at the HSBC Arena in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015. (AP Photo/Felipe Dana) Felipe Dana Vucevic scores 18, Magic top Brazilian team Flamengo 90-73 
Brazil Flamengo's Robinson, left, and Marcelinho, double the defense on Orlando Magic's Tobias Harris, during a preseason basketball game as part of the NBA Global Games Rio 2015 at the HSBC Arena in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015. (AP Photo/Felipe Dana) Felipe Dana Vucevic scores 18, Magic top Brazilian team Flamengo 90-73 
Orlando Magic's Tobias Harris scores past the defense of Brazil Flamengo's Meyinsse, during a preseason basketball game as part of the NBA Global Games Rio 2015 at the HSBC Arena in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015. (AP Photo/Felipe Dana) Felipe Dana Vucevic scores 18, Magic top Brazilian team Flamengo 90-73 
Orlando Magic's Mario Hezonja dunks against Brazil's Flamengo during a preseason basketball game as part of the NBA Global Games Rio 2015 at the HSBC Arena in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015. (AP Photo/Felipe Dana) Posted: Saturday, October 17, 2015 8:07 pm Vucevic scores 18, Magic top Brazilian team Flamengo 90-73 Associated Press | 0 comments 
RIO DE JANEIRO (AP) — Nikola Vucevic scored 18 points, Shabazz Napier added 14 and the Orlando Magic took command early on the way to beating the Brazilian club Flamengo 90-73 on Saturday night as part of the NBA Global Games. 
The Magic led 13-2 early and eventually built a 28-point edge. Victor Oladipo scored 13 for Orlando and Evan Fournier added 10 for the Magic. kAm|2C46=@ Q|2C46=:?9@Q |24925@[ 2 =@?8E:>6 qC2K:=:2?
